section.title: Purpose
section.p: Shut down the appliance. Press the power button to power the appliance off. The appliance does not automatically restart. If you want to restart the appliance after you run this command, press the power button again.

refbody.section: Usage NotesIf you are connected to the command line through a network connection, for example by using ssh, your network connection is ended during the shutdown. If you want to see all the messages for the full shutdown cycle, you must be connected to the appliance directly.

section.title: Example
section.codeblock:
device shutdown Ok
Preparing system for shutdown: s1 hb hn 2 0 s2 rs nt hc ns sy ul r0 machine shutdown
